description.Functions:
Headless Security Mode: Orientation of the drone in relation to the pilot. The pilot can fly the drone to any location without worrying about which direction the drone is facing. Help beginners to prevent from losing the direction. Great function when the drone is out of sight. 
 Altitude Hold: Altitude Hold enables selfie drones to Auto-Hover. The drone can stay at current height when pilots' hands are off the controller. 
 Gravity Sensor Mode: The gravity sensor mode enables the remote control drone to follow the direction you move your smartphone. There are many other functions can be activated in the APP.

reviews: This cam is verry good. value for money product . The packaging is verry neat . The camera it self is verry good can not compare it to go pro. It's taking too much time atleast 6-7 hours to full charge and when comes to use its last less than 1hr of continuous shooting.

Colour tone production, lots of effect, smooth touch screen, good battery life, etc.
Just go for it.

but one must also invest in additional lenses to get the most out of d5600 .
like in my case I ordered 35mm 1.8g lens when  paired with d5600 produced great results .

description.Functions:
Headless Security Mode: Orientation of the drone in relation to the pilot. The pilot can fly the drone to any location without worrying about which direction the drone is facing. Help beginners to prevent from losing the direction. Great function when the drone is out of sight. 
 Altitude Hold: Altitude Hold enables selfie drones to Auto-Hover. The drone can stay at current height when pilots' hands are off the controller. 
 Gravity Sensor Mode: The gravity sensor mode enables the remote control drone to follow the direction you move your smartphone. There are many other functions can be activated in the APP.

product_name: Canon M50 Mirrorless Camera Body with Single Lens EF-M 15-45 mm IS STM

reviews: Amazing picture quality...Canon colour science is always amazing...Anyone that is looking for a compact camera should buy it. 15-45mm gives you good results but consider buying an canon adapter then you can choose from a wide canon EF and EF-S lense which opens a whole new possibility to capture incredible results.
Bang for bucks. Premium mirrorless camera.
Got this with the 18-150mm kit lens. Better than the 15-45mm kit lens.
Pros:
1. Simply go for it. If you are rich then go for the canon R mirrorless series because canon is not going to expand this M series as this is their budget series
2. Don't spend money on buying EF-M lenses as they will be completely useless of you try to upgrade your camera in future.
Rather buy the EF-M mount adaptor and buy the EF SMT regular dslr lenses.
Point to note her...

Was fixed on Canon 80D for a professional level camera mainly for YouTube videos. Then got stuck at M50 for its price to performance. M50+Speed Booster+Prime lens; a deadly combo!!     Got the package delivered in 2 days. Product was snugged in tightly with adequate bubble wrapping. Packaging was neat.     Out of the box, the camera was easy to assemble with the lens and battery. On the default settings, it can produce excellent images with ease, thanks to the brand new Digic 8 sensor. Images...

Awesome camera, one of the best mirrorless camera within budget, 18-150 lense is also superb, picture quality is good and as it is all touch screen it is easy to adjust the controls in manual Mode and it will help the newbie photographers who is switching from mobile to DSLR. One can blindly buy this and learn photography.

It's a Beast in small body. It gives the complete pro manual control of all the settings in a very simple interface. Also the image quality is pretty good and dynamic range is nice. It can be completely controlled from smartphone and the display is good. It's very light and portable. The build quality is not very premium but at this budget its value for money. Flipkart deliery was also great. I will recommend this to all without 2nd thought at this 50k budget. There is already a firmware upda...
Best compact budget camera... (after 8month usage)
1.Lightweight compact
2. Images are not as good as niKon (same price models)but videos are pretty good focusing system is good
3. Short battery life considering its a mirror less so keep that in mind

4 . Feature rich camera wifi bluetooth NFC also the canon app is good file transferring is smooth. Screen can rotate 180 degree so variety of angle you can try , screen quality is not that good so don't think what you saw on it is the final resul...

Nice product in this price range . Great features available in this price range and the best things is flip screen and dual auto focus features. But one thing, i Never except that the size is too small as compared to a dslr camera. I switched dslr to mirrorless and now i realise i just choose the best option for my vlogging set up. If ur a vlogger than this camera is perfect for u in this price range. U can see the size difference between two different camera . The big 1 is the dslr and the s...

Guys who are buying this product consider yourself you are getting one of the best ever camera for video purpose but hen you consider yourself for buying it for capturing photos there are  other cameras which do good but if you want this you are getting the best product for video in the budget + average photos
I recommend to go for it
4 stars is enough for the product as it lacks for photos

After using for a year.. I can say it's the best thing ever for portability and carry.. Just a friendly advice get yourself a pancake lens and a 50mm. I use it for mainly street photography and it is easy to carry in my jacket pocket with a pancake lens

Nice deal to have M50 body + 18-150mm eos m kit lens in ~50k. Best choice as a beginner camera, better option than eos 800d or 77d, to my opinion. Only drawback is the video recording limitation of 30 min. Don't know why it is there.

Thought a lot if I should go for 80d... obviously the premium feel is not there with M50... but better choose this for so many advanced features not present in 80d (like so many auto focus points, 10 fps continuous shooting, digic 8 processor etc.)

Sony E mount lenses cost double of what their/nikon/canon dslr lenses costs. Lens lineup is not that strong either.
Have to hunt for availability of...

I was owning D5100 and was thinking to upgrade to full frame. But then a thought came to mind - I am not professional and carrying 1.5 weight during travel is not worth. what I can achieve is just better low light performance ?? at very high cost ?. as a non professional I thought that its important for me to have lite weight gear that's easy to carry. I read about iso performance of this and decided to go with 6000L.
I am happy with my decision , kit lens is super sharp through out focal le...

description.Functions:
Headless Security Mode: Orientation of the drone in relation to the pilot. The pilot can fly the drone to any location without worrying about which direction the drone is facing. Help beginners to prevent from losing the direction. Great function when the drone is out of sight. 
 Altitude Hold: Altitude Hold enables selfie drones to Auto-Hover. The drone can stay at current height when pilots' hands are off the controller. 
 Gravity Sensor Mode: The gravity sensor mode enables the remote control drone to follow the direction you move your smartphone. There are many other functions can be activated in the APP.

product_name: Sony Alpha 7M3 Mirrorless Camera Body Only

reviews: A Professionals choice.
This is not a review (it will be posted after 3-4 months usage).
This is about the Package and the First Impression.
The package was delivered in an excellent condition. Kuddos Flipkart.
CONTENTS:
1. Camera (obvious)
2. External Charger worth INR 5000 (Not written in contents included)
3. UHS-II 64 GB memory Card worth INR 8000 (Not written in contents included)
4. Camera Bag (Not written in contents included)
5. HOTSHOE CAP (Not written in contents included)
It...
received 7M3K today with best price of the year, it includes free Sony bag, charger and UHS2 64gb SD card.
this is most hyped camera and best in the class considering its price.
some clicked photos clicked on auto mode with kit lens .
Best camera ever. Loving it.
Incredible specs. Slightly affordable during the festive season due to the multiple offers running.

One of the best camera in today's world. Top class low light performance and the eye tracking is the best features in this camera out of all its features. Flipkart delivery is real quick and the packaging is top class. I would suggest to go for this camera i  you are looking yourself as a professional photograher. A worth investment.
One of the Best fullframe camera for Portrait, landscape and even Wildlife Photography.
On time delivery. And like others have mentioned, pleasantly surprised to see the external charger, sd card and camera bag in addition to the body!!
Thank you!!
Thanks toflipkart.
Then about the seller verry gud fast shipping unexpected  guddies with the camera box like memmory card 64 gb and a sony bag and a charger .. and verry good price  thanks for all
Can't compare any camera with this camera and it's price point...
this is a great camera in 2019 i get a battery charger and 64 gb is memory card. Thanks flipkart
It took almost 15 days to deliver.
But the Product is A1.
I will update the review in future.

product_name: Sony ILCE-6000L/B IN5 Mirrorless Camera Body with Single Lens: 16-50mm Lens

reviews: After using for a short period of time, it gives professional experience. Great quality product with this budget. I want you to prefer   Sony alpha ILCE -6000Y for beginner photography.  cinematic video recording is awesome at this price. I just attaching few photos below to show my experience.
Pros:
1. Features/Price in Camera body
2. EVF, Focus Peeking in manual focus.
3. Wifi connectivity - simplifies workflow
4. Adapted lenses, availability of adapters (shop from aliexpress)
5. USB charging - supplied charger is too slow, i use my power bank 1.2 A output to charge my sony a6000
6. Size, Weight
Cons:
1. Lenses
Sony E mount lenses cost double of what their/nikon/canon dslr lenses costs. Lens lineup is not that strong either.
Have to hunt for availability of...

I was owning D5100 and was thinking to upgrade to full frame. But then a thought came to mind - I am not professional and carrying 1.5 weight during travel is not worth. what I can achieve is just better low light performance ?? at very high cost ?. as a non professional I thought that its important for me to have lite weight gear that's easy to carry. I read about iso performance of this and decided to go with 6000L.
I am happy with my decision , kit lens is super sharp through out focal le...

Wonderful and technically perfect camera at half the price of a highend DSLR camera. Recently I had been to Goa and Ooty and shot many pics which are beautiful and clear. Having very good experience with this camera.
C Bhattacharya

I was pretty sure about canon m50... But suddenly I think sony is expensive but it provides best quality.. so I purchased sony a6000 it's my best decision focusing system is fast and accurate.. if u r beginner and your budget is 50k then go with a6000
Best camara at this price point and sony have most satisfying technology then others. Kit lenses are enough to capture high quality images
Attaching some shots captured with my sony alpha 6000 kit lenses
If you are a beginner i would suggest buy the body alone and then get a good glass.
Pair this baby with a Sigma 30mm f1.4 and Boom You get super sharp images wit that nice Bokeh BG ;)
Started loving Mirror less and my next upgrade will be a Sony Full frame. #MirrorlessFTW

Got my sony camera in well condition. I would  like to run it with easy guide. My eye got tired when I read its manul and user guide. And I also don't  like to see utube etc. Those all r difficult  for my eyes. So please  send me bold and easy guide , so tht I enjoy  my product
Amazing Camera...
Very easy to operate..
Very Fast... (auto focus & capture)
Very intelligent Auto mode.. called Superior Auto..  which u can customize as per ur requirement...
Very fine detailing in photos...
compact size is definitely a huge Advantage over DSLRs..
for the same quality of the images...
also, Good offer price by Flipkart and quick delivery...

Fabulous camera, even though it is an older model it is still good in 2020. I used Canon 1200D for 6 years and wanted to upgrade. Glad I made this choice. Mirrorless camera makes huge difference as you see on the screen what you will get in the shot. And the color reproduction in sony cameras is amazing. I have only used it for pics so far and havent used video a lot.

product_name: Nikon D7200 DSLR Camera AF-S 18 - 200 mm VRII Kit Lens

reviews: I have owned a point-n-shoot bridge camera so far. This is my first DSLR. I sincerely believe a DSLR is not something to be bought as a first camera. Buy a bridge point-and-shoot first. They offer 75+ % of the functionality of a DSLR, along with the possibility to explore various types of photography such as macro, landscapes, long zoom, etc. without the hassle of a different lens for each type of photography. If you know what kind of photography interests you, and you want to get better imag...

I have been using this D7200 for the last 3 months (not bought from Flipkart). Earlier I had 2 D7000 bodies, 1 Nikon 18-105mm VR lens and 1 Tamron 150-600mm VC lens. I sold off one of my D7000 with the 18-105mm and bought this D7200 with the 18-140mm VR and one 50mm f/1.8 prime lens.

Now i mostly use the D7200 with my tamron 150-600mm for bird and wildlife photography. D7200 is a huge improvement over the D7000 in terms of picture quality, sharpness of the clicked image and in many other aspe...

Very good camera. Does what it is supposed to do. Takes excellent pictures. The movie mode is a bit clunky and would have liked to be able to take stills in the middle of the movie. Focuses well in poor light but you do need to hold it steady!
Upgraded from D5200 to D7200.
I had read a lot of confusing reviews, that this kind of upgrade is not really an upgrade.
I must say, they were wrong.
One must not compare only the image quality.
The image quality is definitely better though.
Reality check after upgrading to D7200
1. Fast and accurate focus - this is a major factor.
2. AF fine tune - a big advantage
3. Awesome 3D tracking AF is way better.
4. SB700 flash can be used off camera without a transmitter.
5. The kit lens 18-140 is...

D7200 is one of the best DSLRs having best compliments from photographers around the world. It's a best budget camera for passionate wildlife photographer like me. Expeed 4 image processor with 24.2MP DX sensor having no Optical Low-Pass Filter makes it robust. It's 51 dynamic area auto focus points gives you fast and detailed reach of subjects. Happy with it.. Worth buying.. Thanks Nikon

Shopping and delivery was excellent in flip-kart. Delivered as promised.  After lot of speculation I had opted Nikon D7200 and as soon as it was delivered, I took it for an indoor photo-shoot. Outcome was excellent. I can really take pride in choosing this crop sensor DSLR. It suited by price range as well.
Thanks flip-kart and Nikon for the amazing product.
Thanks
Anish.

I was amazed by super quick delivery by Flipkart. Regarding Nikon D7200 this is one of the most advance prosumer APSC camera in the market. I was using D7100 . Though this D72000 camera is a minor upgrade to the precursor I noticed faster focusing and at least one stop increase in light sensitivity from sensor. I shoot mainly wildlife and landscape for which it is suitable. Those interested is sports photography might upgrade to Nikon D500.

product_name: Sony Alpha ILCE-6400 Mirrorless Camera (Body Only)

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world
My dream camera, very good in videography. Small & compact. Use tripod for better photo capture. Complex sony menu, but manageable. I'm very much satisfied.

reviews: The Sony a6300 is currently the best semi pro SLR camera available. Period.
It has 4k video, 120fps for slo-motion video, and my favourite feature of all, an external mic input.
I make videos for YouTube and an external mic is just essential for great audio.
I cannot comment on the image capabilities of this camera as I'm not a professional photographer.
However, as a consumer I have noticed some limitations. The biggest drawback with this camera is battery life. I would highly recommend ...
Tiny little Beast
absolutely stunning build quality and amazing performance. Recommend for travel photographer who can carry more lens with compact body.
perfect camera for semi pro photographers...
It is perfect crop sensor for those who are new to dslr era. It shoots perfect 4k video. Only thing lacking is in-body OIS. Buy body with zeiss lens for amazing results.

reviews: Best camera with Best Price...Zoom is excellent as u can see in this picture...focus excellent and the picture quality is outstanding...overall I must say thanks Canon and thanks Flipkart for this brilliant product and the great delivery 😊😊
I bought SX540HS after reading multiple reviews at Flipcart and Amazon.
After a month of usage, I can say this product is recommended . It can't beat a DSLR but is good for day-to-day photography without struggling with lots of technical skills.
Pros:
A budget camera and can beat any of the mobile cam.
Good Image Quality
Zooming at 35-40X gives a perfect shot.
Cons:
Battery life is not just for 120-150 clicks.The full battery charging takes 2.5-3 hours.

Good camera. Zoom is powerful. Up to 50X zoom the image is clear. The extra digital zoom add noise in the photo's. You need Adobe Photoshop to edit them to get satisfactory results. The micro photography & closeup photography is satisfactory. Overall it's a good camera but not the best. Not for professional.

Specificationswise, on paper,  this camera may appear  on par with other Brands' cameras.  But  Canon lens, flash and remaining components perform outstandingly when compared to other brands. . Although  Powershot cameras like SX720HS and  SX730HS  are available for 5 or 6 thousand rupees more,  I strongly believe they cannot compete with this SX540HS  which is a time tested one. With robust build,  fantastic Optical Zoom of 50x and Digital Zoom of 50X  and feature rich  Camera  has been owne...

reviews: Product is amazing, The Build quality is nice and the image quality is awesome. The auto focus is smooth as butter. Best for videos.

Bought this DSLR on Big billion sale. Very happy with the performence through 18-55 stm lens. Some sample photos which I have transferred to my mobile, are attached here. I am extremely happy with its low light performance. All the photos here are unedited. I was bit confused between M50 and 200d mark II but atlast choosed the later one for its wide variety of lens options.

So, The camera comes with a standard lens to get you started. The build quality is great. Feels good in the hand. Lightweight and compact. This comes with the new Digic 8 image processor. And does a fine job out of the box. And editing some photos may also shock you with excellent results. 10/10 Will recommend.  If you're a beginner and looking to stick with a DSLR and grow with it then look no further. I've added 2 of the best photos I took with the stock lens. Used Lightroom to finish it off.
Super camera. Eazy to use. Photos is perfect. 55-250mm super clarity. Both 2 lence is perfect. Vedio and photo 4K vedio👌👌👌👌 not good for wedding photography.

I have some image of portraits that we take with this product with kit lense 18-55mm the result is great. I have neutral the colure, contrast,and also saturation.

Colour tone production, lots of effect, smooth touch screen, good battery life, etc.

but one must also invest in additional lenses to get the most out of d5600 .
like in my case I ordered 35mm 1.8g lens when  paired with d5600 produced great results .

product_name: GoPro HERO8 Black Sports and Action Camera

reviews: it's a good camera and the best thing about it is the gimbal like stabilization of the camera .
Now from my experience and using it for my recent trip to Dharamsala, here are some of the pros and cons I noticed:
Pros
1.Gimbal like stabilization.
2.Overall Video quality.
3.Protune features and flat profile make editing easier .
4.Manual ISO and shutter control options .
5.Timewarp feature
6.Nightlapse
Cons
1.Still image quality
2.Low light performance is average
3.No carrying case not even ...
TRAGIC BATTERY LIFE. No one warned me before buying that it's battery lasts only for an hour and take 2-4 hrs to charge. What a damn!

Also, this doesn't comes with a charger, just a type C Cable. Though you can use old Samsung less than 2A chargers since GoPro says to use max 2 A chargers since it's battery is only 1220 mah and ideal charging is 1.5A only. And Official GoPro charger costs around 4K and doesn't comes in box. A spare battery costs min Rs.1800. So overall they are looting us.

it's a superb buy.... Go pro 8 is too good... videos are so lively and vivid.  Gopro 8 has hypersmooth 2.0 which gives you a real steady videos while driving walking, running etc..so it's a worth buy at this price range. you need to buy a 3 way shorty to use it properly mainly for holding ...overall satisfied with the purchase

reviews: One of the finest Dslr camera i hv ever seen... No need to think.. jst go and grab it.. if u need a high mid rnge Semi professional Camera go for it.. no will able to mke Difference between a pro nd this Semi pro.. because it has the Same ExSpeed processor which nikkon D50 has.... So.. i just loved it... Go for it...
Nikon D7500 is a semi-professional camera built with high-end features.
Buying this range product from e-commerce websites is little sceptical in India. I had many questions related to seller, warranty, genuineness before buying this product.

I received this product in three days at my door. When I opened it was unsealed and I was 100% satisfied with delivery and genuineness. It has all the accessories which Nikon provide like a 16GB Memory card, a Nikon bag, 18-105 Lens, lens cover, hood,...

EXCEPTIONAL CAMERA Best part is that I got it in 66k which was almost 7k less than my market price. This is a cropped sensor camera but it stand 2nd in Nikon's cropped sensor series after Nikon's D500.. Very good packing and comes with 8 gb class 10 card and a bag with both side shoulder mount.

I needed to replace my 7200 (it broke) and debated back and forth and with full frame 750 (I will be purchasing the 750 in August). You can compare and see the technical differences yourself but what I can tell you is I LOVE this camera. It is super fast at 8FPS, the group focus is excellent, color beautiful and love the Bluetooth. When it came down to pro vs con, the 7500 won. It's only cons were one SD spot and no back up battery grip. I always shoot with 2-3 cameras on me and carry spare b...

Really good camera, one of the best APS-C in the market today, has better dynamic range than any other under 1 lakh rupee body. only disappointment is the crop factor in 4K video on top the DX CROP of 1.5, in 4K field of view is 2.25 times equivalent crop compared to FX, but helps when using with telephoto lens 300mm becomes 600+ mm , how cool is that. Sad that 35mm prime lens in 4k gives less field of view approximately 80mm. RAW 14 bit is great to bring out the details of  under exposed ima...
Camera was a good one.. But a week after my  purchase the dslr cost was even more reduced 😭. But its okay i got a good one. Packing was good and delivery was on time as  mentioned.
its amazing product i am very happy

product_name: Canon EOS 200D II DSLR Camera Body with Single Lens 18 - 55 mm f/4 - 5.6 IS STM

reviews: Product is amazing, The Build quality is nice and the image quality is awesome. The auto focus is smooth as butter. Best for videos.

Bought this DSLR on Big billion sale. Very happy with the performence through 18-55 stm lens. Some sample photos which I have transferred to my mobile, are attached here. I am extremely happy with its low light performance. All the photos here are unedited. I was bit confused between M50 and 200d mark II but atlast choosed the later one for its wide variety of lens options.

So, The camera comes with a standard lens to get you started. The build quality is great. Feels good in the hand. Lightweight and compact. This comes with the new Digic 8 image processor. And does a fine job out of the box. And editing some photos may also shock you with excellent results. 10/10 Will recommend.  If you're a beginner and looking to stick with a DSLR and grow with it then look no further. I've added 2 of the best photos I took with the stock lens. Used Lightroom to finish it off.
Super camera. Eazy to use. Photos is perfect. 55-250mm super clarity. Both 2 lence is perfect. Vedio and photo 4K vedio👌👌👌👌 not good for wedding photography.

It was amazing product.. I'm really happy with that... I'm from north-east india. And purchasing product online is  not so trendy. But i know well flipkart never take a risk. They send me the product very well... Packaging is good.. And also the product what you expect is great. I have some image of portraits that we take with this product with kit lense 18-55mm the result is great. I have neutral the colure, contrast,and also saturation.

This is a really good DSLR by canon . I was confused between Canon and Nikon. But I came to know that Nikon is only good for photography and the video quality is not upto mark. This Canon dslr is really awesome with great features.
Anyone searching for a good camera under 50000 should go for this model. It's good in both video and photo.

I am just falling in love with the camera the more I am using it everyday. Everything is almost as expected from a Canon DSLR. The touch is very sensitive, the camera built is premium, response is fast l thanx to its all latest digic 8 processor. The photo taken are of great quality even on lowlights.  Attached is a Sam photo taken after sunset with lowest daylight condition. There are more sample photos to be taken, I will upload more in the coming days.

very easy user interface so that any beginner like me got familiar with its functionality, it's auto focus I think beast in this price range,thanks to Flipkart team for timely delivered.overall worth for money

If you are a pro photographer, then both the lenses you should buy, and always clicks pics in manual mood, it's really fun to take pics with the 55-250mm zoom lens... later on you can buy 50mm f1.8 STM lens as your requirement.... Otherwise this product is A+ !! Go ahead guys for this DSLR !!!

This camera is a must have. If you are youtuber this is the best camera for you. It’s beginner friendly and the lens is everything you want to have. I never regret buying this camera. It came with a 16GB memory card and the battery power capacity of this camera if 100% thank you flip kart thank you canon for this awesome product.
